column1: SC011 LAW JUNCTION TO UDDINGSTON JUNCTION (VIA HOLYTOWN)

column3: Single Line*Down trains may depart Haughhead Jn signal 419and up trains may depart Hamilton Central 1 minuteafter the preceding train has cleared the section

column4: Note: there are no intermediate signals betweenGlasgow Central Low Level and Argyle Street ineither direction.   A Down train cannot depart ArgyleStreet until at least 1 minute after preceding trainshas departed Glasgow Central Low Level; an Uptrain cannot depart Glasgow Central Low Level untilat least 1 minute after preceding train has departedArgyle Street.

column1: SC029 LARKFIELD JUNCTION TO SHIELDS JUNCTION
